summary: A new hamlet outside the Western Watch Tower with a goat ranch and a Micro Brew. Adds a new ingredient and potent new ale!
descriptionHtml:
Just before the civil war erupted across Skyrim, a well traveled Nord and a beleaguered Dark Elf, brothers from older adventuring days, decided to settle down as neighbors and live the simple farming life.

What This mod adds; A new settlement beside the Western Watchtower, with a goat ranch and a micro brewery. A new ingredient \"hops\" has been added to the game for alchemy purposes, and Bleakwind Bjorn sells his now famous Bleakwind Brew from his humble Bleakwind home.

Bleakwind Brew: a costly but potent ale that restores stamina, increases magicka regeneration, and a small amount of health over time. Surely Bleakwind Bjorn is the finest alesman in Skyrim.




Compatible with Western Watchetower Restored.
author: Kyman3
